programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Lover'S Concerto
programme.desc: Anonymous love letters keep coming to Ji-hwan, refreshing his memories 5 years ago of two long-lost best friends, but when love rushed in, who will be left behind?

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo is under threat by the opposing Nowon and Soron factions and struggles to protect his throne. He faces opposition from every direction and becomes the target of assassination.

programme.title: Search Out
programme.desc: When a social media influencer finds traces of cyberbullying that led to his neighbor's suicide, he teams up with his friend to untangle the mystery behind the deadly game.

programme.title: The Tooth And The Nail
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name by Bill S. Ballinger, the story tells of a magician who plans the most elaborate trick in order to uncover the hidden conspiracy behind his fiance's death.

programme.title: Steal My Heart
programme.desc: Hot-shot police detective Lee is out to get a hit-and-run driver and discovers the driver is his long-lost girlfriend from ten years ago. He tries to protect her before her crime record accumulates.

programme.title: The Front Line
programme.desc: Near the end of the Korean War, an uneasy ceasefire is ordered, but fighting continues on the front line of the Aerok Hills as soldiers battle to determine a new border between North and South Korea.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: A Year-End Medley
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Year’s Eve.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 1 The Subversion
programme.desc: A young girl escaped from a government facility and lost all her memory. Years later, when she appears on a nationally televised show, mysterious faces from her past life reappear.

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: As the family celebrates their purchases of a new condo after 11 years of effort, the building was engulfed in a sinkhole due to heavy downpour.

programme.title: The Prison
programme.desc: A former detective enters a prison as a convict in order to meet a man who is known as The King among the inmates so he can reveal the truth about his brother's death.

programme.title: Love+Sling
programme.desc: Despite having zero interest in the sport, Sung-woong trains to become a top wrestler with his dad's enthusiastic support. When the girl he likes falls for his dad, they begin wrestling for love.

programme.title: Broken
programme.desc: Two teenage boys raped and murdered Sang-hyun's daughter. The infuriated father unintensionally killed one of the murderer and became a fugitive himself...

programme.title: A Single Rider
programme.desc: A man who has lost everything in his life travels to Australia in search of his family.

programme.title: Miss Baek
programme.desc: A woman finds it difficult to shake off her ex-convict label, until she meets a girl whom she is determined to save.

programme.title: Wonderful Ghost
programme.desc: A patrol officer’s soul gets separated from his body while he was investigating a case. Unexpectedly he discovers his neighbor who runs a judo studio is the only person can see him.

programme.title: Sympathy For Lady Vengeance
programme.desc: A woman planned revenge against her teacher after being wrongfully imprisoned for 13 years.

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: The Roundup

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo is under threat by the opposing Nowon and Soron factions and struggles to protect his throne. He faces opposition from every direction and becomes the target of assassination.

programme.desc: Three men who’ve made a pact to commit suicide plan their last night out but things change when a beautiful woman appears in front of them.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep855856
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45194520
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1969
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3519
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) Ep369
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3521
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45214522
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) Ep369
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep859860
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45214522
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45224523
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1769
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1028
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: The Big Call
programme.desc: A young policeman goes undercover to try and capture a criminal group specializing in mobile fraud who has swindled hundreds of millions of yuan from business tycoons and ordinary people.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: The pregnant queen of the monster realm flees a civil war and lands in human world, near Yung Ning Village. She seeks the help of a wimpy villager to become the surrogate father for her child, Wuba. From the time he was born, little Wuba embarks on a thrilling journey to escape from those who want to capture him at all costs.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are constantly fighting with each other on everything, and now they are competing to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the Super Star midwife Gong San to “supervise” their sons and nephews to make it happen…

programme.title: Miracles of The Namiya General Store, The
programme.desc: From Japan's best-selling author, Keigo Higashino, comes a heartwarming fantasy of an everyday general store that becomes a portal through time. When three delinquents accidentally enter the premise, they trigger a series of events that allow a letter from the past, seeking advice, to mysteriously slips through the mail slot.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Man’s father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes…

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled “2046” which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man’s wife, mistress, love child and his grandma for a huge ransom. Little did they expect that the heartless tycoon has hired an assassin to take them out instead of paying the ransom.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: A hijacking of a police van occurs when the Police Commissioner is away from Hong Kong. Deputy Commissioner Lee leads a rescue operation code-named Cold War. Fellow Deputy Commissioner Sean moves to take control from Lee as he thinks Lee is emotionally affected by his son being held hostage, but the efforts end up threatening both their reputation.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Seven friends get together and decide to play a game where they must share all the messages and calls and app notifications on each other’s cell phones. Hilarity and drama follows as everyone's secrets are unveiled throughout the evening, and the seven friends find themselves more like strangers to each other than ever before!

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack…

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: Bai Xing Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel located in Qian Dao Lake, Hang Zhou, with a service level only worthy of a four-star hotel. The head office sent Cruella Koo, a tough executive, to lead reforms for the hotel and upgrade the employees’ performance to reach the five-star level.

programme.title: Our Time Will Come
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, Fan Lan accidentally helps to rescue the writer Mao Dun and is recruited to join the anti-Japanese guerrilla. In order to protect Fan Lan, her mother takes Fan Lan’s place to relay military intelligence but was arrested. Fan Lan must now seek help from her ex-boyfriend who works for the Japanese…

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: A Japanese family with lowly paid part-time jobs turns to shoplifting to make ends meet. After one shoplifting session, the father Osamu and his son come across a little girl in the cold. Osamu’s wife agrees to take her in after learning her hardships, and they seem to live happily together until an unforeseen incident reveals hidden secrets..

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: A London businessman whose teenage daughter dies in a terrorist attack is determined to take revenge. His relentless search for the terrorists leads to a conflict with a British government official whose own past may hold the clues to identify the elusive killers.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Killer Limo
programme.desc: Full of sword fights and action-packed sequences, catch this exciting crime-action about a young woman who seeks revenge against criminal organizations who killed his father in Thailand.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2012
programme.desc: This beloved slapstick comedy series continues as it follows four couples who meet through a dating website. Four men go on a heroic mission to help four women and wind up experiencing a series of mishaps.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Martial arts melodrama about a lady-warrior who raises the son of the swordsman who scorned her. Unknowingly, she also has a twin sister that has been raised by her enemy and trained to eventually kill her…

programme.title: Tales Of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Celebrated scriptwriter Shen Chiang (Heroes of Sung) continues to spread his magic touch to directing with this tale surrounding the end of the Song dynasty. Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu ( Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Peng fought against many swordsmen and won, so he could not accept his first defeat and wanted to commit suicide. It is at this time that Peng meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader. They fall in love and want to get married. The Sect leader gives Peng the “Full Moon Scimitar” on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Sex, Love And Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed “The Invincible Fist” is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fête. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant’s confusion, threatening the couple’s union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the “speed gang”, led by Johnny, and Kuo’s sister Carrie is molested by Johnny’s brother Michael. Kuo’s family continues to be harassed by the “speed gang” while on the island – can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong’s hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: A former Monkey Kung Fu master crippled by a ruthless villain is convinced by his young disciple to teach him monkey kung fu, so as to avenge his shame.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master named “Shadow Whip”, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to “Shadow Whip”?

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends’ help.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Hui picks up a purple shell and gives it to Ha as a momento. When her husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while he also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Spirit Of The Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot…

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: An actress has information on a crime syndicate and assassins are sent after her. Ricky and Swordflower are to stay undercover at the actress’ house to capture the assassins. When three assassins eventually turn up at a recreation building, Muscle and Ricky arrive in the nick of time for the showdown.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: Melody Of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s “a-go-go” era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the “Tsai Li Fu” style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wen’s brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wen’s home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fiancé, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Pyaar Prema Kadhal
programme.desc: A man is conflicted when he falls for a free-spirited woman that he knows that his mother will not like.

programme.title: Sowcarpettai
programme.desc: A young couple is all set to get married, but an evil businessman and his henchmen brutally kill them. The lovers then return as spirits to exact revenge on their perpetrators.

programme.title: Poduvaga En Manasu Thangam
programme.desc: A young man's dream to do good deeds for the upliftment of his village is interrupted by an influential man, who does not want anyone to grow above him.

programme.title: Sindhubadh
programme.desc: Thiru, a crook, falls in love with Venba and marries her before she goes to Malaysia. However, everything turns upside down when her father sells her for the skin trade.

programme.title: 101 Jillavin Azhagan
programme.desc: 101 Jillavin Azhagan

programme.title: En Peyar Surya En Veedu India
programme.desc: Following two violent incidents at a club and a police station, a short tempered soldier is challenged to give up anger if he wants to fulfill his dream of serving at the borders.

programme.title: Vanavarayan Vallavarayan
programme.desc: Vanavarayan and Vallavarayan are two brothers who share a strong bond. Problems arise when Vanavarayan meets Anjali, a beautiful girl, at a wedding and falls in love with her.

programme.title: Kaadan
programme.desc: Kaadan is a true-blue animal film signifying a deep and strong bond between humans and animals.

programme.title: Rekka
programme.desc: Shiva, who is known for helping couples elope, is forced to kidnap a politician's daughter by a gangster, David, after he stops his wedding to a girl who did not want to marry him.

programme.title: Kadugu
programme.desc: A man goes up against corrupt and powerful people to avenge the crime committed against a child.

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: Kavya, a rich girl, goes to a restricted area in Andaman to celebrate the New Year with her friends. While evading the forest officers in the jungle, she knocks Jara, a tribal man, with her car.

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: Billa Pandi
programme.desc: Billa, a kind-hearted construction contractor, is in love with his aunt's daughter, Valli. However, problems arise when another woman, whose house he built, develops feelings for him.

programme.title: Mathil
programme.desc: Lakshmikanthan, a common man, builds a house of his own and is very attached to it. When a local politician vandalises his home, Lakshmikanthan decides to go up against him.

programme.title: Seshu Yaar?
programme.desc: Problems arise when Seshu, a delinquent falls in love with a girl named Abitha.

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali From Nadukkaveri embraces the Power and the Importance of Education for Women. Born as a Girl Child in a village called Nadukkaveri, How Kamali becomes the identity of the same village is what this film is all about.

programme.title: Junga
programme.desc: Junga is involved in a fight, because of which his family loses the theatre that they own. In order to get it back, he devises a plan that takes him to Paris, where he fights a criminal gang.

programme.title: Oru Pakka Kadhai
programme.desc: Meera and Saravanan fall in love with each other and decide to get married after completing their education. However, their lives turn upside down when she gets pregnant while still being a virgin.

programme.title: Rowdy Boys
programme.desc: Kavya, a medical student, and Akshay, an engineering student, begin to fall for each other. However, an ugly gang war between their respective colleges impacts their love story.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Taana
programme.desc: A life struggle of a man who's trying to become a policeman as his family members wish and forced him to become police and save their village.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Imtihan
programme.desc: Vicky, a popular singer, meets and falls in love with Preeti, who does not reciprocate his feelings but agrees to marry him. Soon, he realises that she is hiding something about her past.

programme.desc: Inder, a contractor who believes in the power of money, places a bet with his friend Prakash to woo Rama, a simple girl. Rama gets charmed by Inder, but an event forces her to leave the city.

programme.title: Tanu Weds Manu
programme.desc: Manu, an NRI doctor, comes to India in search of a bride and falls in love with Tanu. Poles apart from her suitor, Tanu, a fun-loving girl, rather enlists his help in eloping with her lover.

programme.title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
programme.desc: Prem falls in love with Jenny, a woman who is already in love with a man named Rahul. Despite this, he agrees to help her marry him and even gets into several comical situations as a result.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Upon being released from prison, Sachi demands to lead a tranquil life with his family. However, fate has other plans for the ex-convict when he encounters a dangerous drug lord.

programme.title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster Returns
programme.desc: Aditya is trying to recover from his wife's betrayal and his physical disability. Meanwhile, Indrajeet Singh, a prince whose property was confiscated by Aditya's family, returns to exact revenge.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars

programme.title: Jab Pyaar Kisise Hota Hai
programme.desc: Sooraj Dhanrajgir, a playboy, falls in love with Komal, who rejects him because of his vices and gives him time to change. Things go awry when a little boy shows up claiming to be his son.

programme.title: Luv U Soniyo
programme.desc: Mark, a collegian, falls head over heels for Soniyo, who develops feelings for him as well. However, their parents oppose their union as they both hail from different cultural backgrounds.

programme.title: Ki & Ka
programme.desc: Kia, an ambitious woman, marries Kabir, a man who prefers the role of a house husband. They enjoy their unconventional relationship until challenges including ego clashes and jealousy set in.

programme.title: Ki & Ka
programme.desc: Kia, an ambitious woman, marries Kabir, a man who prefers the role of a house husband. They enjoy their unconventional relationship until challenges including ego clashes and jealousy set in.

programme.title: Action Replayy
programme.desc: A son tries to revive his parents' lifeless marriage by travelling back in time to the '70s when their romance was budding. But to his surprise, it turns out to be more complex than he had expected.

programme.title: De Dana Dan
programme.desc: Two penniless friends are in desperate need of money in order to marry their respective girlfriends. In their attempts to make quick money, they kidnap a rich woman's pet and demand a hefty ransom.

programme.title: Thackeray
programme.desc: Balasaheb Thackeray, a cartoonist with a no-nonsense personality, plays a key role in the birth of the Shiv Sena and goes on to become the most influential political leader in Maharashtra.

programme.title: The Legend Of Bhagat Singh
programme.desc: Born in British India, Bhagat Singh witnesses numerous atrocities during his childhood and grows up to become one of the most fearless freedom fighters in the country.

programme.title: Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai
programme.desc: Rahul falls in love with Sandhya, a fellow college student, but realises that she does not reciprocate his feelings. Undeterred by her rejection, he still pursues her but pays a huge price for it.

programme.title: Naqaab - Disguised Intentions
programme.desc: Sophia is engaged to millionaire Karan who is completely in love with her. However, when she meets her true love, Vicky, and starts seeing him secretly, her relationship with Karan suffers.

programme.title: Pyar Ki Ladai
programme.desc: A jobless man spends his time doing unfruitful things, but his life changes when he falls in love with the sister of a sarpanch. However, to marry her, he must win a kabaddi match.

programme.title: Jung
programme.desc: Veer is an honest police officer who desperately needs to save his son's life. However, after losing all hope, he finds out that a criminal in jail is his only saviour.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A guy who just wants free cable TV instead gets a new best friend he can't get rid of.

programme.title: Something's Gotta Give
programme.desc: A high-rolling older music exec suffers a heart attack - recuperating at his young girlfriend's house, he meets her mother. Sparks fly, but a young doctor (Keanu Reeves) is also interested!

programme.title: Gone With The Wind
programme.desc: On the eve of the United States Civil War, rich, beautiful and self-centered Scarlett O'Hara (Leigh) has everything she could want—except Ashley Wilkes (Leslie Howard). But as the war devastates the South, Scarlett discovers the strength within herself to protect her family and rebuild her life. Through everything, she longs for Ashley, unaware that she is already married to the man she really loves (Gable)—and who truly loves her—until she finally drives him away. Only then does Scarlett realize what she has lost … and decide to win him back.

programme.title: Casablanca
programme.desc: Rick Blaine owns a nightclub in Vichy controlled Casablanca, frequented by refugees desperate to escape German domination. Despite the ever-present human misery, Rick manages to remain uninvolved in World War II now raging across Europe and Northern Africa. But all that changes when Ilsa Lund walks through the front door of Rick's club. Rick must now choose between a life with the woman he loves and becoming the hero that both she and the world need.

programme.title: Save The Last Dance
programme.desc: In this urban romance, a white small-town girl moves to Chicago and meets her new boyfriend who is a black teen from the South Side with a rough, semi-criminal past.

programme.title: Tequila Sunrise
programme.desc: A former L.A. drug dealer tries to go straight but his past and his underworld connections bring him into the focus of the DEA, the Mexican feds and the Mexican drug cartels.

programme.desc: A high-profile lawyer chooses to defend an Appalachian boy accused of murdering an Archbishop. Closer examination of the facts reveal dark secrets about the Archbishop, and the boy's past.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: Cady Heron is a cultural blank slate when she first sets foot on the grounds of North Shore High School in a small town outside of Chicago, Illinois. After living in Africa, Cady has no idea how "wild" things can be in civilization until she crosses paths with one of the meanest species of all, the "Queen Bee," who at this school is the cool and calculating Regina George. But Cady doesn't just cross paths with this Queen Bee--she really stings her when she falls for Regina's ex-boyfriend Aaron Samuels. Now Regina is set to sting back by pretending to still like Aaron so he won't go out with Cady, all the while pretending to be her friend. With no choice but to use the same M.O. to stay in the game, the "Girl World" one-upmanship escalates until the entire school gets dragged into a first-class mean-fest.

programme.desc: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

programme.title: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
programme.desc: Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: The Traveller: The Wayfarer
programme.desc: Thomas Bareski is a wandering, nature-loving ex-cop who lives out of his van and his life’s mission is to help solve some of France’s 310 unsolved murders. He arrives in Montallier to investigate his first case – the disappearance of a young girl.

programme.title: Sebbe
programme.desc: Sebbe is fifteen. He never planned to build a bomb but now, he has one in his hands. Growing up poor and with a single mother, life had always been difficult. The junkyard soon became his place of refuge where he could detach himself from the world.

programme.title: Love and Mazel Tov
programme.desc: In a bid to impress Anne, the attractive Jewish bookstore owner, Daniel pretended to be Jewish. As the lie gets out of hand, he can only hope she will continue to love him when the truth is inevitably revealed.

programme.title: Clay Pit
programme.desc: It’s the 90s in Russia. Mila has returned home to a remote Russian town after failing to “make it in Moscow” while her sister is about to wed Rustam, a charming young man. But when Rustam becomes the centre of conflicting passions, terrible chaos ensues.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: My Brothers
programme.desc: In this heart-warming Irish road movie, three young brothers take to the streets in a stolen bakery van to replace their dying father’s watch. Headed for Ballybunion, they are quickly side-tracked by a medley of hilarious mishaps and quirky oddballs.

programme.title: The Traveller: Midnight Mayhem
programme.desc: A young woman is found dead in the Arles region, tied up and naked on a pile of wood. Bareski believes this murder is linked to that of two other women killed in 2021 and 2017. He is not alone in the hunt for the killer. An enigmatic woman joins him.

programme.title: Nursery Rhymes
programme.desc: Through nursery rhymes and the politics of language, we see a childhood spent under Japanese Imperial rule in 1940s Singapore.

programme.title: The Night Guard
programme.desc: Salvador, a security guard working the night shift in Mexico City, attempts to leave his workplace to attend an important engagement elsewhere. When questioned by police about a case, he tells a white lie that soon escalates into dramatic consequences.

programme.title: Modern Murder: Level X
programme.desc: Simson is a popular social media prankster. When he is shot by an unknown assailant while live-streaming a prank, police find themselves unable to get any witness information. Investigations reveal the darker side of the glitzy world of social media.

programme.title: Sebbe
programme.desc: Sebbe is fifteen. He never planned to build a bomb but now, he has one in his hands. Growing up poor and with a single mother, life had always been difficult. The junkyard soon became his place of refuge where he could detach himself from the world.

programme.title: Murder In Luberon
programme.desc: A middle-age hunter is found murdered while on a hunting trip. While digging for clues, detectives excavate startling information about his private life. He was a serial seducer and master manipulator with dirty family secrets.

programme.title: Clay Pit
programme.desc: It’s the 90s in Russia. Mila has returned home to a remote Russian town after failing to “make it in Moscow” while her sister is about to wed Rustam, a charming young man. But when Rustam becomes the centre of conflicting passions, terrible chaos ensues.

programme.title: Modern Murder: Eye For An Eye

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: 7 Hours To Win Your Heart
programme.desc: When Giulio’s fiancée cheats on him right before their wedding, the newly singled Giulio decides to attend classes to win back his fiancée taught by Valeria, a beautiful and determined relationship coach disillusioned with love.

programme.title: My Brothers
programme.desc: In this heart-warming Irish road movie, three young brothers take to the streets in a stolen bakery van to replace their dying father’s watch. Headed for Ballybunion, they are quickly side-tracked by a medley of hilarious mishaps and quirky oddballs.

programme.title: Murder On Omaha Beach
programme.desc: An American veteran is found tied to a pole in his uniform on a landing beach, allegedly executed “as an example”. Captain Eloise has to overcome personal grievances and work with her estranged father, a WWII expert, on the perplexing case.

programme.title: The Traveller: Midnight Mayhem
programme.desc: A young woman is found dead in the Arles region, tied up and naked on a pile of wood. Bareski believes this murder is linked to that of two other women killed in 2021 and 2017. He is not alone in the hunt for the killer. An enigmatic woman joins him.

programme.desc: When a childhood friend accused of murder by the Russian mafia is kidnapped, Karla feels a personal connection to the case. How will she figure out the truth of the matter?

programme.title: To Live To Sing
programme.desc: Zhao Li is the manager of a small Sichuan Opera troupe. When their theater risks getting demolished, she desperately tries to find a new venue. Soon, the line between her bleak reality and the colorful fantasy of opera starts to magically blur.

programme.title: The Traveller: Thief In The Night
programme.desc: Marion was kidnapped on her 8th birthday in Vendee. 29 years later, Judge Elgouarch asked Bareski to resume the investigation because a letter of remorse from the assassin surfaced. Judge Elgouarch’s late father was the investigator of the case then.

programme.title: The Human Part
programme.desc: While telling his parents and two sisters that he is a successful CEO of a large IT company, Pekka is actually bankrupt and penniless. He cons strangers for money and food. What happens when his parents show up for a surprise visit?

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Homicide in St. Petersburg
programme.desc: When a childhood friend accused of murder by the Russian mafia is kidnapped, Karla feels a personal connection to the case. How will she figure out the truth of the matter?

No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep1
programme.desc: Blood In The Water - As the NCIS team searches for Gibbs after wreckage from his boat is discovered, they find out he was tracking a serial killer with journalist Marcie Warren (Pam Dawber), who wrote an exposé on him

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep2
programme.desc: Nearly Departed - While trying to find the serial killer Gibbs was after, the NCIS team discovers another person has been tracking the case as well

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep3
programme.desc: Road To Nowhere - Gibbs and Parker go on a road trip to find one of the serial killer’s victims. Also, Agent Knight goes undercover at a large manufacturing company with ties to the murders

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep4
programme.desc: Great Wide Open - Gibbs and McGee head to Alaska while the team works at home to uncover the conspiracy behind the serial killer

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep5
programme.desc: Face The Strange - The NCIS team investigates the death of a Navy commander whose body suddenly explodes before Jimmy can examine it

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep6
programme.desc: False Start - NCIS investigates the death of a beloved Navy commander who trained some of the top athletes in the country

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep7
programme.desc: Docked - NCIS investigates the death of a man on a cruise ship whose body is discovered in the ship’s sauna by none other than McGee’s mother-in-law, Judy (Patricia Richardson)

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep8
programme.desc: Peacekeeper - NCIS investigates the case of a Navy reservist whose body is found in a beat-up car at the end of a gun range. Also, Kasie weighs the pros and cons of buying a gun.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep9
programme.desc: Collective Memory - When a hotshot financial advisor is found shot at a naval station, NCIS investigates the case by interviewing the victim’s three-dimensional hologram of herself, which she created before her death.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep10
programme.desc: Pledge Of Allegiance - NCIS is called in when Navy Chief Warrant Officer Rafi Nazar (Artur Zai Benson) is suspected of trying to sell stolen classified Navy software used to pilot combat drones.

programme.title: Battle In Seattle
programme.desc: Seattle broke into a full-scale state of emergency as thousands of protestors gathered in resistance to the World Trade Organization. The lives of the city’s mayor, a SWAT cop on the streets and his pregnant wife, and four demonstrators intersect in the ensuing riots.

programme.title: One Point O
programme.desc: After receiving mysterious empty packages inside his apartment, a young computer-programmer begins a personal investigation into their origins.

programme.title: Global Effect
programme.desc: A soldier (Daniel Bernhardt) leads a band of mercenaries to rescue a scientist (Mädchen Amick) and prevent a terrorist (Joel West) from unleashing a devastating virus.

programme.title: Beta Test
programme.desc: Champion gamer Max Troy discovers events in a video game are being mirrored in the real world. Joining forces with the game's protagonist to unravel the conspiracy before the game's sinister plot overwhelms the city.

programme.title: One Point O
programme.desc: After receiving mysterious empty packages inside his apartment, a young computer-programmer begins a personal investigation into their origins.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Kingdom Of The Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry 'Indiana' Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: When a prisoner escapes, the New York City detective and his partner are teamed with a Japanese detective to recapture him, leading the audience into Osaka's exotic underworld, where rival Yakuza crime factions battle for supremacy.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Hilarious comedy of a tough, hard-hitting Detroit street cop who takes matters into his own hands when a murder investigation takes him to the ultra-chic community of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Steel Sharks
programme.desc: In this undersea thriller, a United States chemist is captured by terrorists. But a rescue attempt by an elite group of Navy Seals goes wrong when they are captured. Now they must wage a silent war beneath the waves.

programme.desc: Champion gamer Max Troy discovers events in a video game are being mirrored in the real world. Joining forces with the game's protagonist to unravel the conspiracy before the game's sinister plot overwhelms the city.

programme.title: Bokeh
programme.desc: On a romantic getaway to Iceland, a young American couple wake up one morning to discover every person on earth has disappeared. Their struggle to survive the mysterious event lead them to reconsider everything.

programme.title: Fatal Crossing
programme.desc: High flying tech entrepreneur Carson wakes up in a bloody car with no memory of what happened the night before. His world in chaos, things only get worse when he falls for June, who believes Carson killed her boyfriend.

programme.title: Curvature

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A primatologist wants to return a gorilla to the wild, and a geologist wants to find diamonds. Their mutual expedition to the Congo uncovers the lost city of Zinj - and its deadly secret.

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: In 1942, after falling in love with a French agent during a dangerous North African mission, an Allied counter-intelligence agent is quietly notified that the woman he has married and had a baby with is likely a Nazi spy.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawkes Bay - Historian Riria Hotere heads out to sea to check out an innovative fishing method. Meanwhile, maritime archaeologist Matt Carter investigates a fascinating wartime mystery and geologist Hamish Campbell finds fortune in the region's tectonic terroir.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S9 Ep7
programme.desc: Arizona - A disabled retiree turned into a modern-day nomad travels across the United States and uses a renovated military transport vehicle for her journey.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep4
programme.desc: Denby (Mugs) - Gregg Wallace visits the Denby factory in Derbyshire, which has been making pottery since 1809. The British drink a staggering 195 million mugs of tea and coffee every day, so Gregg is following production of one of the factory's best sellers, the Halo Heritage mug.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Yukon - The Yukon is a river of beauty and dangerous extremes - a place where the 'call of the wild' is still strong. Home to grizzlies, moose and salmon, it lies at the heart of a vast northern wilderness.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong continues his journey around Iceland where he samples the local delicacy of rotten shark, takes a whale watching trip, plays golf at midnight, learns to ride an Icelandic horse and sings in a farmers' choir.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawkes Bay - Historian Riria Hotere heads out to sea to check out an innovative fishing method. Meanwhile, maritime archaeologist Matt Carter investigates a fascinating wartime mystery and geologist Hamish Campbell finds fortune in the region's tectonic terroir.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep5
programme.desc: Chairs - Gregg Wallace and the team look inside a furniture factory making chair, following it from carving wood to making the finish product.

programme.title: Lion: The Rise and Fall of the Marsh Pride S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Marsh Pride of lions have lived for generations in Kenya's famous Maasai Mara Reserve. The pride's history is a tale of shifting loyalties, bloody take overs and sheer resilience. Naturalists, guides, vets and conservationists in Kenya and back in the UK offer a unique perspective on the life of these lions.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S1 Ep2
programme.desc: South West Pacific - Martin climbs an active volcano in Vanuatu, and in Tonga meets a third gender leiti and a princess. In Fiji he visits a tribe tricked out of their homeland by a British mining company.

programme.title: The Boxing Day Tsunami S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Earthquake - Xand Van Tulleken and Raksha Dave tell the dramatic story of tsunami which killed more than 250,000 people. They begin 12 hours before the disaster on Christmas Day 2004 when holiday makers across Asia enjoyed blissful breaks, unaware that a natural disaster was heading their way.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Guatemala - Robson Green travels to Guatemala in Central America to fish for one of the fastest fish on planet Earth.

programme.title: The Supervet S7 Ep11
programme.desc: Bertie, Sunny and Edith - Noel treats bouncy golden retriever Bertie who has a dislocated hip, Tibetan terrier Sunny who's almost immobile, and springer spaniel Edith who has a bulging spinal disc.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Silk Road Adventure S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Uzbekistan and Kyrgyzstan - This final episode sees Joanna Lumley travel across the post-Soviet, Central Asian states of Uzbekistan and Kyrgyzstan, the heartland of the Silk Road.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep11
programme.desc: A tornado touchdown terrorises a school in Texas. The violent volcanic eruption in Tonga and a tsunami leaves residents trapped with nowhere to go and pilots battle extreme cross winds.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Miami - Robson Green heads to Miami for the Offshore Grand Slam, but will the weather scupper his plans?

programme.desc: Follow the Bay Family’s matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies’ leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Out of the Darkness Ep1
programme.desc: Winter releases her iron grip. In Iceland Arctic foxes scurry across mountains to mate. In Shetland an otter raises her cubs. In Norway a vast reindeer herd descends to the calving grounds. A huge March storm rages across the Stormborn lands.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Bahamas Exuma Cays Ep5

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Heidelberg Ep1
programme.desc: Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.desc: Leopard problems plague the community as hunger-ravaged predators roam dangerously close to nearby villages. The team at Ol Pejeta need to safely snare a leopard and relocate it for the good of man and beast.

programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Puss In Boots: The Three Diablos Ep1
programme.desc: Puss In Boots: The Three Diablos - After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless “Heart of Fire Ruby” a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol Ep1
programme.desc: Far Far Away Idol - Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless Ep1
programme.desc: Scared Shrekless - Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that they'll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: Madly Madagascar Ep1
programme.desc: Madly Madagascar - Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf Ep1
programme.desc: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf - The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost Of Lord Farquaad Ep1
programme.desc: Ghost Of Lord Farquaad, The (Shrek 4-D) - Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Megamind: The Button Of Doom Ep1
programme.desc: Megamind: The Button Of Doom - After one "button" unleashes the gigantic robot MEGA-MEGAmind on Metro City, MegaMind and Minion must rely on their old tricks to restore order.

programme.title: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space Ep1
programme.desc: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space - Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens. The altered pumpkins then start to implement their fiendish plan to take over Earth. The Monsters are there to combat the mutant gourds and try to smash their wicked scheme!

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders: Huttsgalor Holiday Ep1
programme.desc: Dragons Rescue Riders: Huttsgalor Holiday - When a series of unpredictable winter storms threaten to ruin Odinyule, the Viking holiday of giving, the Rescue Riders must figure out how to save the holiday.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter The Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep5
programme.desc: Akila Says No - When Brian and Cleo try to get Akila to say “no”, they find themselves face to face with the galaxy’s grossest outlaws, the scavengers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep27
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 1 - Prince Barty and Princess Julienne, King Julien's needy and dramatic parents, must take over for their son when he's held captive on a pirate ship

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep2
programme.desc: Stuck/ Mozart - Peabody tries to play an Irish jig while trapped in the elevator; Mozart blows his big piano audition and lands everyone in jail.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep26
programme.desc: Tur-Bros / The Snailman - During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep1
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Rupert And The Butterfly Collector - Rupert, Bill and Edward set off to look for butterflies in the wood. In particular they hope to see the rare Polka Dot Butterfly. On the way, they meet a Butterfly Collector who is also looking for the Polka Dot but - instead of just enjoying watching the butterfly - he wants to catch it in his net and keep it in a jar. The friends see it as their mission to protect the Polka Dot and let it fly free.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Rupert And The Lost Stars - Rupert pedals his car to meet Bill and Ping Pong at the tree house where they plan to spend the night. On his way he meets Raggety who is very proud of the new lantern he has made from glowing bugs he found in the forest. Rupert invites him to sleep at the tree house but Raggety announces he is a big brave elf and wants to sleep by himself. At the tree house, Bill has a surprise for Rupert. Astra the Star Girl has come to Nutwood, but sadly she has not come to play. She dropped some new stars while she was hanging them in the sky. They have fallen down to Earth and she has followed them to Nutwood. She has to get them back in the sky before nightfall or they will miss their first moonlight and fade away forever. Ping Pong magics Rupert's car into a flying car to assist their search but there are lots of shiny things in Nutwood sending them on false trails. Evening approaches and time is running out. Meanwhile, Raggety prepares for his night alone, and discovers the glowing bugs in his lantern can talk.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep41
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Noisy Challenge - Crocky challenges Raa Raa to make a noise with everything in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Will Raa Raa succeed?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep42
programme.desc: Catch The Page - Topsy is trying to read, but Raa Raa and the other jungle animals are all racing around making too much noise. Topsy is so upset she accidentally rips the last page from her book… can her friends set off on a noisy chase through the jungle to find it?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep15
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bouncing Bulb - Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep93
programme.desc: Lovelorn Slugsy - Slugsy is having trouble courting Primrose. Stingo's cousin Hornetto offers to help him. But could he be up to no good?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep94
programme.desc: Fifi'S Snowy Fun - It has snowed in Flowertot Garden and all the tots are having fun… except Primrose who is worried she'll get dirty. Can the other tots convince her to play with them?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep10
programme.desc: Permission Impossible/What Possessed You - Permission Impossible When Ra's parents refuse to let him go on the school camping trip, he sneaks away and gets lost in the Scary Woods with Casper and Mantha. What Possessed You? When a lesson in taking possession of a human body goes awry, Casper's human ends up taking possession of him!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep73
programme.desc: Clear Day - The Atlas and Lions arrive on Planet Drazan to provide security for their Annual Clear Day Celebration. Allura wrestles with a decision that may lead to Honerva’s downfall but at tremendous cost to herself.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep21
programme.desc: The Legends Of The Power Gems: Chapter Four - With all three elemental power gems in hand, Fearless Leader sets out to take over the world. But with every use of the gems, the world becomes more unstable, and they’re heading toward certain destruction

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep21
programme.desc: Packet Racket / Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. // After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.desc: Legend Of The Boneknapper Dragon - Hiccup and the gang join Gobber on a quest to find a legendary boneknapper dragon.

programme.desc: Kung Fu Panda: Secrets Of The Furious Five - Po and the Furious Five face Shifu's biggest challenge yet as they discover it takes a lot more than fast feet and fists to become a kung fu master.

programme.title: Captain Underpants Special 2 - Mega Blissmas Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Xtreme Xploits Of The Xplosive Xmas Special - George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before it’s gone forever!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep7
