programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 2 - As Mort and Clover search for their leader, King Julien shows off his pirate booty moves and convinces the pirates he should be captain of the ship.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Rupert And The Photo Finish - RUPERT lends his TRIPOD to the TWINS to keep their camera steady. The TWINS surprise RAGGETY, who accidentally aims a spell at the CAMERA, which comes alive. Now they're playing camera tag! Except if you get flashed you end up stuck in a photo! After RAGGETY, PING PONG, MING, EDWARD and BILL are all trapped, RUPERT realises that if they all get zapped they won't be able to play again – or even get out of the photos. But RUPERT has a plan. The TWINS act as bait so he can outsmart the CAMERA with its own reflection. The CAMERA takes a photo of itself, which releases everyone, and RAGGETY gets everything back to normal with a final spell.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Rupert Lights The Way - When the Rocky Bay lighthouse stops working Rupert and friends try to help. But what can create enough light to warn the ships away from the rocks? When he sees Ming snapping at a firefly, Rupert gets an idea....

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep43
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Squeaky - Raa Raa is in a particularly helpful mood and offers to help everyone take provisions for the picnic to Rockywockyville for them. But he doesn't arrive in time, everyone sets out to see what has happened to their noisy little lion friend

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep44
programme.desc: Wake Up Huffty - The animals are all looking forward to waking up early to watch the dawn chorus, but Huffty doesn't stir when the alarm goes off. Can Raa Raa and the others wake the sleeping elephant in time?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep17
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Bath - Pat must deliver an old bath tub to Pencaster Lighthouse. But when he goes to collect it from Thompson Ground, the bath ends up rolling away into Greendale with Jess inside! When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep18
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Loch Ness Monster - Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep95
programme.desc: Mystery In Flowertot Garden - Somebody has been going through the tots' bins every night in Flowertot Garden. The tots turn detective to see if they can discover who the culprit is.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep96
programme.desc: Stingo Cleans Up - Diggly has had enough of the heap of unwanted items next to his compost heap. Stingo decides to "resell" them to the other tots and unwittingly helps everybody out!

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep11
programme.desc: Merry Scary Christmas / Time Waits For No Ghost - Merry Scary Christmas It's Christmas and Casper wants to spend the holiday with his human pal, Jimmy. Time Waits for No Ghost When Casper discovers a clock that can stop time, everyone wants to use it for his or her own purpose.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep74
programme.desc: Knights Of Light, Part 1 - With Allura as their guide, the Paladins embark on a dangerous journey into Honerva’s mindspace to uncover her final plan.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep22
programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter One - Every year, the world turns to Frostbite Falls’ beloved cat Frostbite Frannie to declare the first day of summer vacation. When Frannie sees her tail, vacations can begin!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep22
programme.desc: Smoovin On Up / The Great Shell Robbery - Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition / Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow. // When the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green - Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington & says he can thank him by passing it on to someone else, which is harder than it sounds! // Paddington learns all about composting thanks to Mr. Mulch, but will he grow flowers in time for Aunt Lucy?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise / Pups Save a Tower of Pizza - Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas! // Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save a Ferris Wheel - Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114

programme.desc: Fountain Fiasco - Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook!

programme.desc: Bobbi's Bongos - Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Paddington Flies a Kite - It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Dragon Island Duel - It's the day of the Dragon Island Duel, a race around tropical Dragon Island! But when Crusher cheats and sends Blaze away before the race, AJ must set out to rescue his best friend and bring him back to the starting line.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Bouncy Tires - When Zeg the dinosaur truck accidentally puts on a set of “Super Bouncy Tires,” he bounces out of control! Now Blaze and AJ have to experiment to find a substance adhesive enough to stop their bouncing buddy.

programme.desc: Santiago's Greatest Treasure / The Golden Banana Treasure - When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. // Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Sleeping Like a Baby - Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Search for the Great Gorilla! - When Primatologists Zooli and Gil searching the rainforest for a Silverback Gorilla, they're chased into an ancient temple by a robotic silverback... who turns out to just be a tiny marmoset guarding a sanctuary of mountain gorillas!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep504
programme.desc: The Good, the Sad, and the Grumpy! - When Mr. Grumpfish turns up in Happy Junction, he makes everyone in town really grumpy! Will Sheriff Molly find a way to help everyone handle their tricky emotions?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep175
programme.desc: The Giant Strawberry - When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep176
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105

programme.desc: Magenta's Case of the Giggles - Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one 'patient' seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington and The House Guest / Paddington and The Banana - Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized. // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost - Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep620
programme.desc: George's Balloon - George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Search for the Great Gorilla! - When Primatologists Zooli and Gil searching the rainforest for a Silverback Gorilla, they're chased into an ancient temple by a robotic silverback... who turns out to just be a tiny marmoset guarding a sanctuary of mountain gorillas!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Sneezing Cold - Gabby, Blaze and AJ are out in the wilderness when they get a call, Blaze's friends have come down with a sickness called the Sneezles! Our heroes must race back to Axle City to bring the sick trucks the medicine oil they need.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Silver Lasso / The Sea Dragon's Treasure - Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure. // After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter

programme.desc: Spider's Web - Ew! There's a spider in the house! Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524

programme.desc: Bubu's Robot - Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Tiny Chef S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Trouble at the Truck Wash - When an overeager Crusher causes the Truck Wash to explode out into Axle City, Blaze and friends will need your help using angles to recover the pieces and get the trucks clean again!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Epic Sail - Crusher and Pickle challenge Blaze and his friends to a sailboat race. But when he tries to cheat, Crusher accidentally crashes both ships onto a tropical island! Blaze and his crew must find the missing pieces of their ship so they can sail home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol - Production Shorts S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Dino Christmas - Christmas in Dino World is interrupted when a tremor from a volcano causes a landslide that traps a Brachiosaurus, and it's up to Ryder and the Pups to come to the Dino Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol - Production Shorts S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Pterodactyl Egg - A Pterodactyl Mom and her egg are trapped on a ledge in a rockslide - Pups to the Dino Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol - Production Shorts S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save the Baby Raptors - A baby raptor gets inside the Dino Lookout causing a commotion, as Rex and Zuma race to save the raptor's siblings and Ryder and the Pups search for its parents.

programme.title: PAW Patrol - Production Shorts S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Tyrannosaurus' Birthday - A surprise birthday party for a Tyrannosaurus turns into a Dino Rescue when the startled guest of honour stomps off, getting stuck in a pit full of quicksand!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Mountain Ninja Rescue - Ninjas Zooli and Oona are excited for their first mission: escorting snow monkey Moshi up Mt. Danger to join his troop! But it won't be easy: a storm looms, and mischievous Moshi is causing trouble! Will they complete their mission in time?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Rockin' Out - Goby and Gil go on a quest to get a geode at the top of a volcano! Will they make it back to the Rocky Valley Rock Show in time to enter the contest for best rock?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Orange Empire - The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep614
programme.desc: The Tiger Treasure - Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep715
programme.desc: Pups Save the Marooned Mayors / Pups Save the Game Show - While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse. // The Wingnuts' farm plays host to a rootin' tootin Game Show hosted by Cowgirl Beryl!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Night of the Disco Lights - Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Raining teddies / Party people - Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector - It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film - Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Mountain Ninja Rescue - Ninjas Zooli and Oona are excited for their first mission: escorting snow monkey Moshi up Mt. Danger to join his troop! But it won't be easy: a storm looms, and mischievous Moshi is causing trouble! Will they complete their mission in time?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Dino Dash - Blaze and AJ are playing with their friend Zeg when he accidentally gets blasted by a geyser into a far away mud pit. It’s up to Blaze and AJ to save him, using engineering design inspired by their new dinosaur-truck friends.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Curse of the Gold Falcon / The Island of Lost Things - Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place. // When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Sleeping Like a Baby - Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Pups Save the Polar Bears / A Pup in Sheep's Clothing - Ryder and the pups must fly to the Arctic in the Air Patroller to rescue the lost cubs. // When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Al’s pasture, it’s up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep113
programme.desc: King - In Teletubbyland, Dipsy is King. Tinky Winky delivers Tubby Custard and Tubby Toast to King Dipsy - whatever King Dipsy wants! Luckily for Tinky Winky they soon swap places.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4) Ep18
programme.desc: Van - Dee encourages a friend to say 'van' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different vans - a yellow van, a white van, a big van and even a veggie van.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep73
programme.desc: Robo Po - When Logi-Po has trouble completing a task on his own, the rest of the team comes together remotely to help him.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep19
programme.desc: It's Time to Search for Seashells - JoJo and Gran Gran are at the beach and begin to look for lots of different types of shells. They also discover a rock pool, some limpets and a hermit crab - which runs away!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep25
programme.desc: Star Yeti - Jeanie wishes she were a famous pop star, but Monty wonders if being famous would really be as great as his sister thinks.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: Tasty Trip - After seeing an advertisement for the World Food Festival, Monty wonders if there are ways to explore the world other than travelling.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: Shaun - Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad gets to transform his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: The Jam Badge - Duggee decides to make some jam with all his fruit, but just as he gets started Naughty Monkey steals the barrel of fruit and runs off with it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: The Super Squirrel Badge - The squirrels decide they want to be super squirrels and find themselves special outfits and 'super' names.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: The Rescue Badge - Enid the cat gets stuck when she chases a mouse up a tree, so Duggee and the squirrels rescue her.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: Middle of the World City: Ecuador - After hearing about how the Monument to the Equator is in the wrong location, Glitch and his Glitchbots pretend to be the Go Jetters and move the monument onto the equator.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Polar Explorers - When Glitch and Kyan race to the south pole, Glitch's loyal Grimbots steal the pole's marker to help Glitch win.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep49
programme.desc: Asparagus - Dad tells Bluey to mind her manners at the table - they're not animals. But when Bluey gets her hands on a stick of magic asparagus, she shows them everyone's got a wild side.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep48
programme.desc: Teasing - Bluey, Bingo and Mum get into a debate with Dad about the definition of teasing. As they recall all the times where he's been a Big Teaser, Dad argues that he was only just playing.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep33
programme.desc: Andy and The Snares Penguins - When the Snare's penguins at Safari World get caked in mud, Andy jets off to New Zealand to find out how these forest dwelling penguins get clean.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: Fun Machines - Motorcycle rider Grace shows off three amazing machines that are all built for fun!

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep13
programme.desc: Plant Hunters - Sinker wants to return home rich and famous like plant hunters of old, so she challenges Cook and Line to find her a brand new flower.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Summer Holiday Badge - The Squirrels are out tobogganing with Duggee when they spot a migrating bird fall from the sky - suitcase and all!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: The Hair Badge - Duggee is having a bad hair day, so the squirrels and Norrie decide to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The Cake Badge - The rabbits are very upset when Happy eats their cake, so Duggee decides to make them a new one with the help of the squirrels.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: The Continent of Europe - When Tala bases her class project on her uncle's travels, the Go Jetters swing into action and help Grandmaster Glitch take his own souvenir selfies across the continent of Europe.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: The Continent of Africa - Glitch takes Tala to the continent of Africa to help her with an Academy project. When the pair get lost, the Go Jetters need to crack the clues and find them in this huge continent.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep12
programme.desc: Salty's Surprise - It is Christmas time on the Island of Sodor and Edward and Thomas are at Brendam Docks, where Thomas is shunting trucks of presents. Salty trundles over and admires the presents train before Thomas takes it to Knapford.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep28
programme.desc: Wool on Wheels - Scarf Lady is holding a 'knitted treats' sale in the park, but the weather is causing a problem...

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep27
programme.desc: Music Fixer - Sarah's Tuba is making some very peculiar sounds, so a trip to the Music Shop is in order.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep32
programme.desc: Rockpool Rescue - The sun is drying up the water so Nelly and Nora make a rockpool rescue.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: I Am Collecting A Collection - Charlie is only missing one dinosaur for his immaculate collection, and it's the hardest one to get. Will he be able to find the Gigantasauras?

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Mine - Tony finds a bone but another dino takes it from him, saying it belonged to her first.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: The Thing That Talked - Bob and Gwen think they hear Tony talk for the first time, so they try to make him do it again.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: Neighbours - Bluey needs her Mum's advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingo's own growing stable of animals.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Drawing Badge - It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: Monteverde Cloud Forest, Costa Rica - A feather duster drama unfolds high in the Monteverde Cloud Forest when Glitch's feather collecting goes wrong. Can the Go Jetters save a rare bird's nest and find a lost trophy?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: Fatberg, London Sewers, England - While Lars, Kelly and Xuli go into the sewers to help keep London clean, Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes down the toilet.

programme.title: The Numtums (S2) Ep19
programme.desc: Dar Dar's Not So Lucky Flower - When Dar Dar's lucky flower starts to lose its five petals everything seems to go wrong for her. Will her luck ever change?

Whether it’s cybercriminals, online giants or intelligence agencies - they all want to get their hands on it. That’s because control over this kind of information means power. But how can the private sphere be protected?

programme.title: Siaran Langsung: Anugerah Bolasepak Kebangsaan 2022 (ABK22)
programme.desc: Anugerah Bolasepak Kebangsaan (ABK 2022): Upacara menyampaikan Anugerah kepada pemain dan jurulatih di atas persembahan yang telah mereka pamerkan sepanjang musim 2022. 16 kategori anugerah telah dinilai penuh terperinci oleh ahli panel pemilih yang terdiri daripada kumpulan individu berwibawa, termasuk bekas pemain, jurulatih serta di kalangan ahli2 industri dalam bolasepak tempatan. Jangan ketinggalan merasai debarannya untuk mengetahui siapakah yang terbaik di kalangan yang terbaik bagi musim 2022!
